uk.co.saiman.acquisition

Interface AcquisitionGates


  • public interface AcquisitionGates
    A configuration interface over a set of time ranges describing pass and fail gates for acquisition.

    Acquisition events, or periods of acquisition data, will be accepted or rejected based on their containment within these ranges.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      The acquisition module this gate configuration interface is associated with.

    • Method Detail

      • acquisitionModule

        AcquisitionDevice acquisitionModule()
        The acquisition module this gate configuration interface is associated with.
        Returns:
        An AcquisitionDevice instance which can be configured via this AcquisitionGates instance.

      • getStartTime

        double getStartTime()
        Get the time before which acquisition data should be ignored. This is absolute regardless of any gates which overlap with this period.
        Returns:
        The start time of useful acquisition data in milliseconds

      • setStartTime

        void setStartTime(double newStartTime)
        Set the time before which acquisition data should be ignored. This is absolute regardless of any gates which overlap with this period.
        Parameters:
        newStartTime - The start time of useful acquisition data in milliseconds

      • getPassGates

        Set<uk.co.strangeskies.mathematics.Range<Double>> getPassGates()
        Returns:
        The set of pass gates participating in this acquisition gate set.

      • setPassGates

        void setPassGates(Set<uk.co.strangeskies.mathematics.Range<Double>> gates)
        Parameters:
        gates - The set of pass gates to participate in this acquisition gate set.

      • getFailGates

        Set<uk.co.strangeskies.mathematics.Range<Double>> getFailGates()
        Returns:
        The set of fail gates participating in this acquisition gate set.

      • setFailGates

        void setFailGates(Set<uk.co.strangeskies.mathematics.Range<Double>> gates)
        Parameters:
        gates - The set of fail gates to participate in this acquisition gate set.

      • passes

        default boolean passes(double time)
        Determine whether the given time passes the set of gate filters.

        Membership is true of a time when the number of pass gates containing that time, subtracting the number of fail gates containing that time, is greater or equal to 0.

        Parameters:
        time - The time we wish to check
        Returns:
        True if the given time passes the gate filter, false otherwise
